alert.note: Alert for Gilmer; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Gilmer and Pickens Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Talking Rock, or near Jasper. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Talking Rock, Sequoyah Lake, Talona, Blaine, Lake Tamarack, Talmadge and Hinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
